originalText.text:
The isles can be a little tight.
I always find what I need because the store is organized well.
The customer service is super. 4.5⭐

text.text:
The isles can be a little tight.
I always find what I need because the store is organized well.
The customer service is super. 4.5⭐

originalText.text: I'm here every week. And I'm not exaggerating I think I'm literally in this store every week at least once. I like to people that run the store they know my face. They don't hassle me about checking my bag. That's something I can really appreciate about this store because many of the other businesses in Harlem make you check your back particularly if you are Black but they'll let others just walk right in without a fuss. There is a newer discount store that I do not go to because after my third visit they were asking me to check the empty bag that I needed to put the items in after I made my purchase at the store. Not here! If you wear a mask and treat people decently they will return the courtesy. And they don't have people following you all over the store either. So yeah 5 stars. You can find what you need and it's not ridiculously overpriced and if there's something you want just ask one of the twins and they'll order it for you.

originalText.text: This .99 cent store always opening up late but closing early. It's unfortunate to have a store within our community that does not accommodate in understanding how  to utilize timing. For mother's day they store was said to be opened at 9:30am online and did not ever open at all. Very unsatisfied and disappointed in such a business. Please do better!

originalText.text: Definitely had the nails I needed to be hammered

text.text: Definitely had the nails I needed to be hammered

originalText.text:
The manager is a nasty man with no respect for customers. Today, screamed at me like an animal because I kept asking "what is the total?" He didn't understand the question so I said it four different ways. And then he started telling me I had an attitude.

Honestly, there's a much nicer one one avenue over. and the staff is actually kind and can answer basic questions.

Never setting foot in there again - and I've been a long time customer.
